events.message: We have successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and will begin processing it shortly.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering department due to their experience in software development and DevOps tools.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to manage the process for this engineering candidate to ensure smooth communication and scheduling.
The initial screening call with the candidate went well, highlighting their strong technical background and problem-solving skills.
The candidate responded promptly to schedule the next steps and expressed enthusiasm about the opportunity to join the engineering team.
We have successfully scheduled the technical interview with the candidate for next week to further assess their coding skills and system design expertise.
